name: TechMeetups.com
tag_list: meetup, tech, startups, web, software, london, silicon, roundabout
overview:
Techmeetups.com launched the London Silicon Roundabout meetup group in Dec 2010 followed by The Cambridge Silicon Fen & The Online Publishing Meetup Groups in Jan 2011.

We started these groups in order to bring together individuals, startups, entrepreneurs, investors, techies and webbies in and around these areas and subject matters.

We are also passionate about Startups & feel that Startups need all the help they can get. To help them further we launched the Techmeetups Startup Mentoring Program to help Startups with advice, mentoring or hands on acceleration programs. We believe this would help Startups position themselves better in the market, present to our Investment Panel at our regular Investor day to raise Funding and to Big Business at our upcoming event “Big Business meets Startup” to land those big deals!

We have also launched TechStartupJobs to help with the acute talent shortage Startups face. Visit TechStartupJobs if you would like to post your latest job openings or browse through some of the hottest Startup jobs from the area.

milestones.description: Launch of TechStartHub a one stop hub for Tech Startups. Covering News, Events, Meetups & Mentoring program & our Investor day.
